synopsis.text: Tetsushi Kaji's admirer, Ayu Tateishi, is the epitome of calm and cool in her middle school. Her days revolve around studying, playing tennis, and strategizing to catch Tetsushi's attention. One fateful day, she discovers a mysterious gadget and returns it to its rightful owner, Nina Sakura, a transfer student. As a token of gratitude, Nina reveals her secret identity as a witch apprentice from the Magic Kingdom. When Ayu is compelled to challenge the boys' tennis team captain, Hiroki Tsujiai, Nina offers her magical assistance. However, the spell doesn't go as planned, and Ayu finds herself transformed into a boy! Will Ayu be able to win the match and her crush's heart in her new form? Join Ayu on her magical journey as she navigates the complexities of love, friendship, and tennis in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
